content.question: Enlightenment philosophes such as Voltaire primarily drew on which of the following to advocate for changing human institutions?

choices.label: A return to traditional religious values as defined by the Roman Catholic Church
Beliefs in alchemy and astrology, which claimed to explain the spiritual forces that shaped the universe
Principles of the Scientific Revolution, such as rationalism and empirical observation
The writings of Martin Luther and other religious reformers from the Reformation period

content.answer: Principles of the Scientific Revolution, such as rationalism and empirical observation

topic.text: 4.1: Contextualizing the Scientific Revolution and Enlightenment
